Service Cloud Basics

Set Up Service Cloud Setup Assistant General Settings Cases Whatâ€™s a Case? Case Teams Set Up Cases for Agents Manage and Work with Cases Create and Clone Cases Update and Respond to Cases Email Customers Solve and Close Cases Close Cases Solve Cases Delete Cases Merge Duplicate Cases in Lightning Experience Enable Suggested Articles to Solve Cases Send Articles from Cases Things to Know About Cases

Service-Level Agreements Contact Requests Service Cloud Mobile Access My Service Journey Design and Optimize the Agent Experience Deflect Cases with Self-Service Add Service Cloud Channels Set Up Routing and Rules Build AI Solutions with Einstein for Service Track Service Metrics and Manage Your Team Send Surveys with Feedback Management Deliver Field Service Provide Ethical Customer Service More Service Cloud Features

To solve cases:

View the case
Find an article or solution that answers the case's question
Attach the article or solution to the case by clicking Select next to a reviewed solution in the list of solutions
Email the solution or article to the contact by clicking Send Email in the Activity History related list
Click Select Template and choose a template, then fill in email fields and click Send
Close the case
title: Solving Cases in Service Cloud
